content: TE-FY (SDS Max) Drill bit extension Extension for SDS Max (TE-Y) hammer drill bits - 2 components required (TE-FY extension plus TE-Y-AD adapter) ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Accessories for tool inserts > Adapters and attachments- - - ### FEATURES:Features Application requires 2 items: TE-Y-AD adapter (item no. 382390) and TE-FY extension bit (available in 3 different lengths) Extend your existing drill bits for use in hard-to-reach places Applications Drilling through-holes with an extended hammer drill bit Drilling extra deep holes in diameter 32 mm and larger Working at a distance from the working surface (e.g. on ceilings) Assembly Combos include TE-Y-AD Coupler and DrillBit Extension Hole diameter must be 1 1/4 (32mm) or greater to accommodate for coupler ### TECHNICAL DATA: Type: Extension Connection end: TE-Y (SDS Max) Working mode: Hammer drilling Technical Data | Type | Extension | Connection end | TE-Y (SDS Max) | Working mode | Hammer drilling | Product information | Assembly Combos include Adaptor TE-Y-AD Coupler and Drill Bit Extension.Hole diameter must be 1 1/4 (32mm) or greater to accommodate for coupler. | Diameter | 1-3/16 in | Working length | 33 in ### ITEMS- 3424019 - Drill bit extension assembly TE-Y - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x Drill bit extension TE-FY-E85 - 1x Extension adaptor TE-Y-AD
